headline: Is KKR’s (KKR) Clean Energy Push With HASI Quietly Rewriting Its Diversification Story?
summary: In recent weeks, KKR has moved to expand its clean energy footprint through a new US$1.00 billion co-investment with HASI, led a US$220.00 million growth investment in quantitative analytics firm Premialab, and continued active dealmaking across sectors from telecoms to consumer and education. These moves, alongside the firm’s upbeat 2026 macro outlook and growing focus on sustainable infrastructure and data-driven finance, underscore how KKR is leaning into long-term themes such as energy...
